name: valliance-resource-management
description: Value-based resource management system for Valliance

scripts.db:migrate: npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- yarn workspace @vrm/database prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:generate: npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- yarn workspace @vrm/database prisma generate
scripts.db:seed: npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- yarn workspace @vrm/database prisma db seed
scripts.db:studio: npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- yarn workspace @vrm/database prisma studio
